Question
========

30,000 telephone calls from the ICT department have a distribution with a mean duration of 173.9 seconds and a standard deviation of 184.8 seconds. You take 16 random samples, each of 80 calls. What then is the sample mean?

Answerlist
----------

* 2.2 seconds
* 10.9 seconds
* 173.9 seconds
* 184.8 seconds

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2.2 seconds: Incorrect
* 10.9 seconds: Incorrect
* 173.9 seconds: Correct
* 184.8 seconds: Incorrect
